word_mean_info__list.difference: 指专门从事治牙的医生。
指专修外科或专修人体某个部分的外科专科医生，这种医生一般需对患者进行手术治疗。
普通用词，泛指各科医生，即一切有行医资格的人。

word_group.brief_definition: 主任医师；首席医师；主任医生
急诊室医生；急诊科医生；急诊医生
一名急诊室医生；一名急诊室内科医师

bilingual.source: She immediately became the first woman ever to be hired as a resident physician in the OB-GYN department of the PUMC Hospital.
bilingual.target: 她立即成为北京协和医院妇产科首位被聘为住院医师的女性。

bilingual.source: Within six months, she was named a chief resident physician, a position that usually took four years to achieve.
bilingual.target: 六个月内，她被任命为首席住院医师，这个职位通常需要四年才能达到。
她是一位经验丰富的医师。

bilingual.source: The physician advised me to get more rest.
The attending physician makes rounds every morning.
bilingual.target: 主治医师每天早上都会查房。

bilingual.source: The chief physician has extensive clinical experience.
bilingual.target: 主任医师有丰富的临床经验。

bilingual.source: The chief physician at this hospital is very famous.
bilingual.target: 这家医院的主任医师非常有名。

bilingual.source: You need to schedule a consultation with the chief physician.
bilingual.target: 你需要预约与主任医师的会诊。

list.abstract: physician是一个英语单词，名词，作名词时意思是“医师，内科医师；抚慰者”。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you ever hear about that Scottish physician?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你听说过那个苏格兰医生吗？

yingyinNormal.en: All right, let's say a physician was prescribing one of our competitor's drugs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 假设有个医生，本来开的是我们竞争对手的药。

yingyinNormal.en: When did you take my blood? Not important. Your sugar was a little high. I'd follow up with your regular physician.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你什么时候帮我抽的血？这不重要，你血糖有点偏高，我会跟你医生保持联系的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: John Ioannidis, a <highlight>physician</highlight> who studies research methodology, says that the policy is "a most welcome step forward" and "long overdue."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 专攻研究方法论的医生John Ioannidis表示，该政策是“向前迈出的最可喜的一步”，而且“姗姗来迟”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Physicians</highlight> who have been on the job for several hours are more likely to prescribe antibiotics to patients.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 连续工作了几个小时的内科医生更有可能向患者开抗生素。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: A team of researchers from the University of York conducted a randomized (随机的) control trial with 691 depressed patients from 83 <highlight>physician</highlight> practices across England.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 约克大学一组研究人员对英格兰83家医师诊所的691名抑郁症患者进行了一项随机对照试验。

examination_example.sentence: The patients were split into three groups: one group received only usual care from a <highlight>physician</highlight> while the other two groups received usual care from a <highlight>physician</highlight> plus one of two computerized CBT programs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 患者被分成三组：一组只接受医生的常规治疗，另外两组除常规治疗外，还分别需要接受两项线上认知行为疗法中的一项。

examination_example.sentence: As a <highlight>physician</highlight>, nutrition is one of the most powerful things you can change to reverse the effects of long-term disease.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为一名医生，营养是你可以改变长期疾病的影响的最强有力的事情之一。

examination_example.sentence: In general, many lifestyle medicine <highlight>physicians</highlight> recommend a plant-based diet — particularly for people with diabetes or other inflammatory conditions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一般来说，许多生活方式医学医生建议以植物为基础的饮食，特别是对于糖尿病或其他炎症患者。

examination_example.sentence: In Southern California, Lima Linda University School of Medicine is offering specialized training for its resident <highlight>physicians</highlight> in Lifestyle Medicine — that is a formal specialty in using food to treat disease.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在南加州，利马琳达大学医学院(Lima Linda University School of Medicine)正在为其住院医生提供生活方式医学的专业培训——那是一个利用食物治疗疾病的正规专业。

examination_example.sentence: In the same way <highlight>physicians</highlight> used to smoke, and then stopped smoking and were able to talk to patients about it, I think <highlight>physicians</highlight> can have a bigger voice in it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就像医生过去吸烟，然后戒烟，能够与病人谈论吸烟一样，我认为医生可以有更大的发言权。

examination_example.sentence: Nonetheless, <highlight>physicians</highlight> say that they look at the collective data and a clear picture emerges.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管如此，医生们表示，他们从集体数据来看，一个清晰的画面出现了。

examination_example.sentence: Scott is delighted to get food advice from a <highlight>physician</highlight> who is program director of the nearby Mary and Dick Allen Diabetes Center, part of the St. Joseph Hog Health alliance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 斯科特(Scott)很高兴从附近的玛丽和迪克·艾伦糖尿病中心(Mary and Dick Allen Diabetes Center)的项目主任那里获得医生的饮食建议，该中心隶属于圣约瑟夫·霍格(St. Joseph Hog)健康联盟。

examination_example.sentence: The food-as-medicine movement has been around for decades, but it's making progress as <highlight>physicians</highlight> and medical institutions make food a formal part of treatment, rather than relying solely on medications (药物) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以食物作为药物的运动已经存在了几十年，但它正在取得进展，因为医生和医疗机构使食物成为治疗的正式部分，而不是仅仅依靠药物。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
